title.rendered: How do I share my listing via SMS, email, Facebook, or other methods?

content.rendered:
Web

  • Login to your Roomi account and click My Listings
  • Click on the listing you want to share from the Active Listings tab
  • Click the listing photo to preview the listing and you can copy and paste the URL. You can also click and share via the Twitter, Facebook, or Email icons from your listing screen.

iOS

  • Tap More from the menu at bottom
  • Tap My Listings
  • Tap the share icon in the bottom-right hand corner of the listing photo from your Active Listings
  • Choose any of the available sharing options from your iOS device

Android

  • Tap the menu icon in the top left corner (represented by three stacked horizontal lines)
  • Tap My Listings
  • Tap the share icon in the top-right corner of your listing photo from your active listing

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I deactivate my listing?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Deactivating your listing will take it out of the search results while giving you the option to re-activate it at a later time. As soon as the listing is deactivated you will need a listing credit in order to reactivate it. When you reactivate your listing you will need to…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I permanently delete my room listing?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Web Please note: Your listing must be deactivated before it can be deleted. Login to your Roomi account from our homepage and click My ListingsClick the Inactive tabClick the trash can icon to delete your listing iOS Tap on My Listings from the menu at the bottomTap the X icon…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I boost my listing?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We offer the option to boost your listing if you need to fill your room quickly. This feature pushes your listing to the top of the search page in your area, enabling users to see your room first when searching for a place. Listing Boosts are non-refundable Web Login to…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I create a listing on Roomi?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: You can make use of your two free credits to create two free listings on your Roomi account to post your available room or rooms for rent on Roomi. You must be in Lister Mode to post a listing.  Please reference our Help Center article, 'How do I switch between…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How to favorite listings
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: How to Favorite Listings If you come across a room you really like you can save that listing to your Favorites.
